description.value: A pair of small, draconic wings grow from your back. While these wings aren't strong enough to help you fly just yet, they allow you to travel longer distances when jumping. When you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{Leap} horizontally, you move an additional 5 feet. You don’t automatically fail your checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.2HJ4yuEFY1Cast4h]{High Jump} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.JUvAvruz7yRQXfz2]{Long Jump} if you don’t Stride at least 10 feet first. In addition, when you make a Long Jump, you can jump a distance up to 10 feet further than your Athletics check result, though still with the normal maximum of your Speed.
